messages.title: Fairness for All - Planning for the future
messages.content: The last two years have been really difficult for our community and our economy but we are on the road to recovery. In recent weeks we've seen falling unemployment figures, rising house prices and from the people I've met on the doorstep there is an increased optimism about the future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Avoided the economic black hole and reduced the national debt more sensibly than cutting government support and choking economic recovery.
To protect the health and education services such as Sure Start centres for children and parents, police officer presence in neighborhoods, and providing tax credits so that it pays to work.
Stressing the value of the NHS being free for all at the time of need, ensuring security in old age, a good state education available to all, reducing child poverty.

issues.economy: The last two years have been really difficult for our community and our economy... there is an increased optimism about the future.
issues.education: To protect the ... education services that we all use...
